services.name: Outlet Replacement
services.description: Replace damaged or unsafe outlets to restore safe power in your home.

services.name: Light Switch Repair
services.description: Fix flickering or non-responsive light switches and improve safety.

services.name: Ceiling Fan Installation
services.description: Install new ceiling fans with proper support and safe wiring.

services.name: Interior Lighting Upgrade
services.description: Upgrade to modern, energy-efficient interior lighting for your home.

services.name: Exterior Security Lighting
services.description: Install motion or dusk-to-dawn lighting to improve exterior safety.

services.name: GFCI Outlet Installation
services.description: Install ground fault outlets in kitchens, bathrooms, and other wet areas.

services.name: Electrical Panel Inspection
services.description: Inspect your electrical panel and connections for safety and code issues.

services.name: Panel Upgrade
services.description: Upgrade older panels to safely handle modern electrical loads.

services.name: Dedicated Circuit Installation
services.description: Add dedicated circuits for appliances like dryers, ovens, or EV chargers.

services.name: Small Business Lighting
services.description: Install or upgrade lighting for offices, shops, and small commercial spaces.

services.name: Tenant Improvement Wiring
services.description: Add or relocate circuits and outlets for small tenant improvement projects.

services.name: Service Call – Troubleshooting
services.description: Troubleshoot electrical issues affecting equipment, lighting, or power.

services.name: Emergency Power Solutions
services.description: Recommend and install backup power options for critical circuits.

services.name: Code Compliance Corrections
services.description: Correct electrical issues identified during inspections or remodels.

services.name: Safety and Maintenance Check
services.description: Inspect panels, lighting, and wiring to reduce downtime and safety risks.
